content: broomstick lace dishcloth crochet pattern by terry mcclary materials worsted weight kitchen cotton uses about a quarter of a ball maybe less size h crochet hook large knitting needle size 13-18 the bigger the needle the bigger the lace any smooth round stick can be substituted gauge not important chain 35 row 1 work this row in bottom row of chain single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook first 2 chain count as first single_crochet single_crochet across 32 single_crochet including first chain stitches do not chain do not turn row 2 pull up a loop onto knitting needle for each single_crochet across 32 loops on knitting needle row 3 slide loops off of knitting needle chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 3dc around first four loops *4dc around each group of four loops across do not chain do not turn row 4 pull up a loop onto knitting needle in each double_crochet across 32 loops on knitting needle row 5-12 repeat row 3-4 five times row 13 repeat row 3 ch1 turn border row 1 single_crochet in each st across 2sc in last stitch *rotate 90 degreess continue single_crochet down the side working 2sc over each outer double_crochet and each outer 2 loops* rotate 90 degrees 2sc in first stitch of bottom row single_crochet across 2 single_crochet in last stitch of row repeat from * to * finish row with 2 single_crochet in same stitch row began with ch1 turn right side now facing you border row 2 single_crochet around with 2 single_crochet in each corner st chain 15 slip_stitch to first chain to form hanging loop fasten_off weave in ends this work by terry mcclary is licensed under a creative commons attribution-noncommercial-no derivative works 3 0 united states license
